title: BSM Vehicle Data in Parquet Format - Beijing Area
BSM Vehicle Data in Parquet Format - Phoenix Area
description: Basic Safety Messages (BSM) from connected vehicles in Beijing area stored in Apache Parquet format; includes vehicle positions, timestamps, geohash indexing, and raw message bytes for decoding.
Basic Safety Messages (BSM) from connected vehicles in Phoenix area stored in Apache Parquet format; includes vehicle positions, timestamps, geohash indexing, and raw message bytes for decoding.
